docs.snippet: The Mayor, , vs. The Second-avenue Railroad Company. This case has been once or twice stated in the TIMES, and the opinion of the Chief Justice was given in the issue of Sunday. The following is the opinion of Justice SUTHERLAND, concurring:

headline.main: The Power of the Common Council to Fix a License Fee upon City Railroad Cars. SUPREME COURT GENERAL TERM.; Before Justices Clerke, Sutherland and Ingraham.
